participant_1.background:
I would love to have lunch with the creator of Thomas the Tank Engine, Wilbert Awdry, to thank him for bringing joy to my childhood.
I do not like to talk about my personal life.
my biggest fear in life is heights.
i am a fruitarian.
i love going to comedy clubs.

participant_2.background:
My worst moment was losing a patient in my arms.
i do not like wearing a swimsuit.
I am most afraid of losing my passion for things I love.
I am not sure what my family members do for a living.
I like to sleep in, but my favorite time of day is sunset.

content.text: Hey!
Hey, how's it going?
Good! I'm just hanging out, watching some TV. How about you?
Not bad, just got home from work. I'm a nurse.
Oh, that's cool! I used to work in a hospital.
Really? What did you do?
I was a janitor. It wasn't my favorite job, but it paid the bills.
I bet! I'm sure it was hard work.
It was, but it was also rewarding. I got to meet a lot of interesting people.
That's good! I'm glad you had a good experience.
Thanks! So, what's your worst moment?
My worst moment was losing a patient in my arms. It was really hard, and I still think about it sometimes.
I'm so sorry to hear that. I can't imagine how hard that must have been.
It was, but I'm trying to move on. I know that I can't let it define me.
That's good. You seem like a very strong person.
Thank you. I try.
So, what's your favorite time of day?
My favorite time of day is sunset. I love the way the sky turns all different colors. It's so beautiful.
I love sunsets too! They're so peaceful.
They are. I love to sit on my porch and watch them.
That sounds nice. I'm jealous.
You should come over sometime! I'll make you some coffee and we can watch the sunset together.
That would be great! I'd love to.
Great! I'll send you my address
